install.description: Handles user detection using HTTP Provided values, typically REMOTE_USER

param.name: userkey
param.label: User Key
param.description: This is the key in the $_SERVER array that holds the username

param.name: username_replacement
param.label: Username Replacement
param.description: This is a pipe seperated (|) list of strings to replace with blanks from the username (e.g. DOMAIN\)

param.name: ip_blacklist
param.label: IP Blacklist
param.description: IP addresses to ignore for Single Sign OnIP addresses to ignore for Single Sign On (newline seperated)
